name: full-select
description: A lightweight JS script for custom select creation.

scripts.clean: rimraf build && mkdir build && rimraf examples/build && mkdir examples/build
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_PATH=src browserify -t babelify src/test/index.js | tape-run
scripts.build: babel src/index.js -s -o build/index.js && browserify src/global.js -o build/index.min.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -p [minifyify --no-map] && browserify examples/src/base.js -o examples/build/base.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run test && npm run build
